attributes.action: Disband Parliament as being too divisive and so unfit for purpose
attributes.additional_details: The electorate have lost faith and confidence that their views are being represented and consider Parliaments ability to act in the national interest is severely & terminally hampered.
attributes.background: Parliamentarians have deviated substantively from manifesto undertakings and adopted undeclared diverse agenda and pursuing those by compounding debate and meaningful engagement on issues of major national importance.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
